parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the vehicle attached to the waypoint.
<br>A vehicle can be attached to a waypoint by
*creating the waypoint on top of the vehicle (in the editor)
*using [[waypointAttachVehicle]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''waypointAttachedVehicle''' waypoint

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[waypointAttachedVehicle]] [groupOne,1]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[waypointAttachedVehicle]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[group]] [[player]], [[currentWaypoint]] [[group]] [[player]]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[currentWaypoint]], [[attachObject]], [[attachTo]], [[attachedObjects]], [[attachedTo]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[triggerAttachVehicle]], [[attachedObject]]
</value></part></template>
